content.rendered:
JOBS

Join the Eddy’s Barber Shop Family!

We’re on the lookout for skilled, professional, and friendly barbers to become part of our team at our Burlingame, CA location. If you’re passionate about your craft and enjoy creating lasting connections with clients, we want to hear from you!

Please submit your resume and contact information below. For any inquiries, feel free to reach out to Eddy at Iyadjaradat2020@gmail.com.

Name
Max. file size: 3 GB.
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
Great Style. Great Haircuts. Awesome Barbers. Great Style. Great Haircuts. Awesome Barbers. Great Style. Great Haircuts. Awesome Barbers.

Meet the masterminds behind the chair

our team of skilled barbers is here to sculpt
your next look with precision and flair.

Signature Haircut

Our most popular service. The signature haircut includes detailed clippers, scissors, straight razor neck shave, shampoo, conditioner, and styling.
$55.00  .  30 min

Senior

UP 65 YEARS
$45.00 ・ 30 min

Beard color

color only black or brown
$35.00 ・ 30 min

Head Shave

Straight razor head shave plus hot towel
$55.00 ・ 30 min

Little Guy Haircut

The perfect cut for kids (4-12 years old).
$40.00 ・ 30 min

SHAVE

A traditional straight razor shave for your face (with hot towel).
$45.00 ・ 30 min

Beard Trim With Straight Razor Line-Up With Hot Towel

Beard trim with a straight razor detailing of the hairline and sideburns and hot towel.
$45.00 ・ 30 min

Haircut and Shave Special

Full-service haircut and traditional straight razor shave or beard trim with straight razor line-up (with hot towel).
$90.00 ・ 1 hr

Haircut and Beard Line-up With Razor Special

Full-service haircut and traditional straight razor line-up (with hot towel).
$85.00 ・ 1 hr

Hair Coloring Only - BROWN OR BLACK

Darken your hair with a single all-over process.
$85.00 ・ 1 hr

Relaxer

Control the curls or waves in your hair with a relaxer treatment that leaves your hair soft, silky, and straight.
$70.00 ・ 30 min
